definition: a light midafternoon meal of tea and sandwiches or cakes
details:
noun
- a light midafternoon meal of tea and sandwiches or cakes
= example: a light midafternoon meal of tea and sandwiches or cakes
= synonyms: afternoon tea, teatime
- dried leaves of the tea shrub
= example: dried leaves of the tea shrub
= synonyms: tea leaf
- a beverage made by steeping tea leaves in water
= example: a beverage made by steeping tea leaves in water
- a reception or party at which tea is served
= example: a reception or party at which tea is served
- a tropical evergreen shrub or small tree extensively cultivated in e.g. China and Japan and India
= example: a tropical evergreen shrub or small tree extensively cultivated in e.g. China and Japan and India
